name: Data Entry UK
tagline: Fast, Accurate and Secure Data Entry
description: For 45 years, Data Entry UK has been delivering the UK's fastest, most accurate and secure data entry service to every size of business and government department. We employ only full-time UK-based staff, and our data entry team has a capacity of over 20 million keystrokes per month.

locations.address: 132, Pryor Wing Fairfield Park Kingsley Avenue
